mapper.select: SELECT MR.NO, MR.MAIL_NO, MR.RECEIVER, MR.TYPE, MR.READ, MR.STATUS, MR.IMPORTANCE, M.SENDER, M.TITLE, M.CONTENT, M.S_STATUS, M.SEND_DATE, E.EMAIL AS SENDER_EMAIL FROM MAIL_REF MR INNER JOIN MAIL M ON MR.MAIL_NO = M.NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SENDER = E.NO WHERE MR.NO = #{mailNo}
SELECT E.EMAIL FROM MAIL_REF MR INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON MR.RECEIVER = E.NO WHERE MR.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND MR.TYPE = 'A'
SELECT E.EMAIL FROM MAIL_REF MR INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON MR.RECEIVER = E.NO WHERE MR.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND MR.TYPE = 'R'
